pullRequest.title: Resume track: creates a segment like pause/continue
pullRequest.bodyText:
Describe the pull request
Resume track option creates a segment like in pause/continue.
Link to the the issue
Improves #103 and #11
License agreement

nodes.bodyText:
Why is lastTrackPoint added?
And shouldn't it be null and thus not do anything? (happens in endrecording(), right)?
Except giving a "Ignore insertLocation. trackPoint is null." in the logs?
"the id of the track to be resumed"
